document.full_text: japanese foreign minister takeaki matsumoto called on tuesday for the easing of restrictions on japanese food imports imposed after the earthquake and tsunami that led to a radiation leak from a japanese nuclear plant.
document.title: japan urges easing of trade curbs after nuclear crisis
lines_and_colors: japanese foreign minister takeaki matsumoto called on tuesday for the easing of restrictions on japanese food imports imposed after the earthquake and tsunami that led to a radiation leak from a japanese nuclear plant.
